info.institution: School of Computer and Communication Sciences, Swiss Federal Institute of Technology
info.summary:
Stefano Spaccapietra works as a full professor in School of Computer and Communication Sciences, Swiss Federal Institute of Technology, and his\her h-index is 36, g-index is 76. His\Her interests are :
 Data Model; Conceptual Modeling; Conceptual Model; Interoperability; Data Mining;
